summary: A BERT-based model that compares an automatic speech recognition (ASR) hypothesis with a list of candidate customization entries and predicts the index of the correct entry (or zero if none match), providing spellchecking and domain‑specific correction for speech transcriptions.
business_intent: Automatically improve ASR transcription quality by applying customizable spellchecking, enabling higher accuracy for specialized terminology and reducing manual post‑editing effort.
